product_name: Indeed LabsGentle AF Makeup Removing Foam Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsMeet Indeed Labs Gentle AF Makeup Removing Foam Cleanser, your new quick-acting, soothing cleanser that melts away excess sebum, dirt, and even waterproof makeup without stripping your skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydratingCleansingEfficient Makeup RemoverKey IngredientsLotus extract: Anti-inflammatory, soothing and calming ingredient to irritated or sensitized skin.Ectoin: Extra hydrating, prevents irritation, provides protection from environmental stressors such as pollutants, exhaust fumes.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2637164How To UseDispense 2-3 pumps of foam into your hands and gently massage onto damp skin, melting away makeup and dirt. Rinse thoroughly with water. For eye makeup, gently massage the foam around the eye area for about 30 seconds, then rinse thoroughly with water.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.IngredientsWater, Coco-Glucoside, Poloxamer 184, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Benzoate, Gluconolactone, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Disodium EDTA, Vitamin B12, Ectoin, Citric acid, Nymphaea Caerulea Flower Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Propanediol, Glycerin.California Prop65 WarningWARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which are known to the state of California to cause cancerLearn more at www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
how_to_use: Dispense 2-3 pumps of foam into your hands and gently massage onto damp skin, melting away makeup and dirt. Rinse thoroughly with water. For eye makeup, gently massage the foam around the eye area for about 30 seconds, then rinse thoroughly with water.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.

reviews.headline: Overall Great Product
reviews.comments: This cleanser is a great first step for double cleansing. It removes makeup and surface debris well. Not drying, not irritating. Wouldn't use as a standalone cleanser or second cleanse, but that's okay! That's not really what it's for! Only downside is that it does really sting your eyes when removing eye makeup.

reviews.headline: Love this for acne prone skin!
reviews.comments: I love my cleansing balm, but I've tried several and they all broke me out, this foam cleanser did not! It doesn't get waterproof mascara off (but most don't). All in all I really loved this!

reviews.headline: Nice product- just not for me
reviews.comments: I don't feel like it completely takes my make up off before I cleanse.  I like an oil based product but since my skin is very sensitive, thought this would be a better option.  Won't purchase again

rollup.name: Gentle AF Makeup Removing Foam Cleanser
